results.title: Learning Lucie style
results.creator_credit: Elizabeth Creese, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Being born with cerebral palsy has forced Lucie to learn things in different ways to other children. In turn, she has proven to be a great teacher to Elizabeth Creese and her family.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Elizabeth Creese, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: The Varnished truth
results.creator_credit: Elly Temelcos, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Elly Temelcos and her two sisters spent hours over the years listening to her father’s stories, about life in the village, the war that tore his country apart and the sorrow of separation.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Elly Temelcos, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Sunday drives
results.creator_credit: Fiona Tinney, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Fiona Tinney delves into the jigsaw of the past, the stories she heard while going on Sunday drives with the family. Even though she was not very interested at the time, these stories, melded with the towns they drove through have imprinted on her memory as Tinney tries to hold on to them.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Fiona Tinney, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Here, there & back again
results.creator_credit: Wayne Hornsby, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Wayne Hornsby was in Thailand when he was diagnosed with HIV. He reflects on his journey, nearly dying and his return to Australia, where his work in helping HIV positive people eventually leads him back to Thailand.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Wayne Hornsby, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: This is my offering
results.creator_credit: Stefanie Christian, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Stefanie Christian dedicates her story to the person who supported her throughout her illness, loved her unconditionally and helped her to envisage a bright future full of adventure.

results.title: Here's to extremes and my journey beyond
results.creator_credit: Kim Davis, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: All her life, Kim Davis believed she could do anything. And she still does, despite the efforts of society or even fate. From a line of strong women, she refuses to let anything beat her and is determined to help others.

results.title: Boy from the block
results.creator_credit: Jeffrey Robertson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Jeffery Robertson grew up in a tough neighbourhood where survival was a daily imperative. Later on in life, this survival instinct would kick in to fight discrimination in the community and to feed his will to live.
